xtce:AuthorSet.xtce:Author: Stefano Speretta, Delft University of Technology
Nikitas Chronas Foteinakis, Delft University of Technology

xtce:NoteSet.xtce:Note: This file describes the PQ9 bus frames for Delfi-PQ.

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PQ9
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: This is the message header used to transfer data on the internal bus. All other messages implement it.

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PQ9
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Base telecommand structure for all PQ9 based telecommands.

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Ping
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Checks if the subsystem is responding.

xtce:MetaCommand.name: GetTelemetry
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: This command requests the housekeeping frame from the selected destination address.
